goal.ch:
Machine learning allows computational systems to adaptively improve their performance with 
experience accumulated from the data observed. This course introduces the basics of learning theories, the design and analysis of learning algorithms, and some applications of machine 
learning. 
The course is designed to prepare junior graduate students with a solid background of machine learning and allow them to use machine learning techniques appropriately in their future 
research or industry projects.
